summary.para: The DHPUBKEY_VER3 structure contains information specific to the particular public key contained in the key BLOB.

remarks.para: DSSPUBKEY_VER3 is an alias for this structure.

summary.para: This must always be set to 0x33484400, the ASCII encoding of "DH3".
Number of bits in the DH key BLOB's prime, P.
Number of bits in the DH key BLOB's prime, Q. If Q is not available, then this value should be 0.
Number of bits in the DH key BLOB's prime, J. If J is not in the BLOB, then this value should be 0.
Seed structure holding the seed and counter values used to generate the primes Q and P. If values in the structure are not available, then the counter element of the structure should be 0xFFFFFFFF.
